cause.description:
The purpose of this cause is to gain an awareness of our generation in ways that will help our lives.
Our generation is generation XYZ:
-Generation X: Baby Busters - 1960 - 1981 MTV Generation/Boomerang Generation - 1974 - 1985
-Generation Y: Echo Boom - 1986 - 1993 iGenertaion - 1994 - 2001
-Generation Z: New Silent Generation - 2001 - 20??
Cause Created July 2007
1. Too much focus is placed on the physical generation of people.
2. It is important to have a timeline awareness of where you lie in history and as different yet similar generations.
3. It is important for elders to be comfortable with their actions with younger generations.
cause.mission: To gain awareness of the defining effects of functioning within a certain generation
cause.name: Our Generation Awareness - Generation XYZ
